title: They WASTED $433.45 on Amazon...
description: This one gets weird. The Oregon Trail Handheld Game on Amazon:  Woting Customizable Headphones on Amazon:  Pictar Smartphone Camera Grip on Amazon:  Hot Wheels Rocket League Playset on Amazon:  Syma Quadcopter on Amazon:   By using our Amazon affiliate links, you help to support the channel as we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  Check out our new channel!  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
